attributes.action: make provision for the arts (including museums and galleries) a statutory duty for local authorities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Funding for the arts is currently a "post code lottery", as spending per head of population ranges from £0.17p to £18.00p depending upon which district you happen to live in.  The ammount allocated to the arts seems to depend mainly upon the personal interests of elected members. A reasonable national level should be established
